body.name: jobId
body.description: Unique identifier for the moderation job whose results are being reported.

body.name: format
body.description: Desired output format of the moderation report, such as JSON or PDF.

body.name: includeEvidence
body.description: Boolean flag indicating whether to include supporting evidence and metadata in the report.

body.name: locale
body.description: Specifies the locale to be used for the moderation report, affecting language and regional formatting.

header.name: Idempotency-Key
header.description: Unique key to ensure that POST requests are processed only once, preventing duplicate actions.

header.name: Authorization
header.description: Bearer token or credentials required to authenticate and authorize the API request.

header.name: X-API-Key
header.description: API key used to authenticate the request and authorize access to the moderation endpoint.

body.name: job
body.description: The identifier of the moderation job that generated this report

items.name: id
items.description: Unique identifier for the generated moderation report.

items.name: type
items.description: Specifies the type of moderation report or content being reviewed.

items.name: status
items.description: Current state of the moderation report, indicating if it's pending, completed, or failed.

items.name: policyId
items.description: Identifier of the moderation policy applied during the content review.

items.name: input
items.description: The original content or data submitted for moderation.

items.name: progress
items.description: Percentage or status indicator reflecting how much of the moderation process has been completed.

items.name: percent
items.description: Numeric value representing a portion or completion rate related to the moderation process.

items.name: stage
items.description: The current phase of the moderation workflow, such as initial review or final decision.

items.name: etaSeconds
items.description: Estimated time in seconds until the moderation process is complete.

items.name: result
items.description: The outcome or findings of the moderation job

items.name: summary
items.description: Concise overview of the moderation results and key findings.

items.name: decision
items.description: The final moderation outcome based on the analysis, such as approved, rejected, or flagged.

items.name: maxScore
items.description: The highest possible score attainable for a given moderation category.

items.name: flaggedCategories
items.description: A list of categories detected in the content that triggered flags during moderation.
Placeholder key used for indexed response items; refers to the first element in a list or array.

items.name: scores
items.description: Numerical values representing the confidence levels across different moderation categories.
Placeholder key used for indexed response items; refers to the first element in a list or array.

items.name: category
items.description: Specific classification assigned to the content based on moderation criteria.

items.name: score
items.description: The individual score assigned to a specific moderation category or rule.

items.name: threshold
items.description: The minimum score required to trigger a specific moderation action.

items.name: status
items.description: Current state of the moderation report, indicating if it's pending, completed, or failed.

items.name: findings
items.description: An array or list of detected moderation issues or flagged elements identified in the job result.
Typically denotes the first element in an array or list, often referencing the initial moderation result or data point.

items.name: type
items.description: Specifies the type of moderation report or content being reviewed.

items.name: message
items.description: Informational or error message providing additional context about the moderation result or process.

items.name: confidence
items.description: The probability score indicating the certainty of the moderation decision.

items.name: timestamp
items.description: A specific point in time within the media content when the moderation event occurred.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: region
items.description: A defined area within visual media flagged for content moderation review.

items.name: x
items.description: The horizontal coordinate of a point or bounding box within an image or video frame.

items.name: y
items.description: The vertical coordinate of a point or bounding box within an image or video frame.

items.name: w
items.description: The width dimension of a detected region or bounding box within visual content.

items.name: h
items.description: The height dimension of a detected region or bounding box within visual content.

items.name: frameIndex
items.description: The numerical index of the frame within a video where a moderation finding was detected.

items.name: textSpan
items.description: The specific segment or range of text related to a moderation finding.

items.name: start
items.description: The starting position or timestamp indicating where the moderation result begins within the content or dataset.

items.name: end
items.description: The ending position or timestamp marking where the moderation result concludes within the content or dataset.

items.name: snippet
items.description: A brief excerpt of text or media content highlighting the context of the moderation finding.

items.name: labels
items.description: A set of descriptive tags or categories assigned to moderation findings for classification purposes.
Typically denotes the first element in an array or list, often referencing the initial moderation result or data point.

items.name: transcript
items.description: The full or partial text transcription of audio or video content subjected to moderation.
Typically denotes the first element in an array or list, often referencing the initial moderation result or data point.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: text
items.description: The textual content associated with a moderation finding, providing context or details.

items.name: speaker
items.description: Identifier or label for the speaker associated with a particular segment of speech or transcript.

items.name: words
items.description: A collection of individual words or tokens derived from the transcript relevant to the moderation report.
Typically denotes the first element in an array or list, often referencing the initial moderation result or data point.

items.name: startMs
items.description: The start time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: endMs
items.description: The end time of a segment or event in milliseconds from the beginning of the media content.

items.name: word
items.description: A single word extracted from the transcript or text that is relevant to moderation analysis.

items.name: confidence
items.description: A numerical score between 0 and 1 representing the certainty level of the moderation finding.

items.name: outputFiles
items.description: A list of files generated as output from the moderation job
Reserved or placeholder parameter, typically representing an indexed item in a list response

items.name: id
items.description: A unique identifier assigned to each moderation finding or report element.

items.name: status
items.description: The current state of the moderation report processing

items.name: purpose
items.description: The intended use or reason for generating the moderation report

items.name: filename
items.description: The name of the report file as stored in the system

items.name: mimeType
items.description: The MIME type of the report file indicating its format

items.name: sizeBytes
items.description: The total size of the report file in bytes

items.name: checksumSha256
items.description: SHA-256 checksum of the report file for integrity verification

items.name: storage
items.description: Information about the storage provider or system where the report is saved

items.name: provider
items.description: The service or system provider responsible for processing or storing the report

items.name: bucket
items.description: The name of the storage bucket where the report is saved

items.name: key
items.description: The unique identifier or path key for the report in storage

items.name: region
items.description: The geographic region where the report was processed or stored

items.name: createdAt
items.description: The timestamp when the moderation report was created in ISO 8601 format

items.name: expiresAt
items.description: The timestamp when the report will expire and no longer be accessible, in ISO 8601 format

items.name: metadata
items.description: Custom metadata associated with the moderation job or report

items.name: reportUrl
items.description: A publicly accessible URL or link to download the moderation report

items.name: error
items.description: Details about any error that occurred during report generation

items.name: code
items.description: A code representing the status or error related to the moderation report

items.name: message
items.description: A descriptive message providing context about the status or error

items.name: retriable
items.description: Indicates whether the moderation job can be retried upon failure

items.name: createdAt
items.description: The timestamp when the moderation report was created in ISO 8601 format

items.name: updatedAt
items.description: The timestamp indicating when the report was last updated in ISO 8601 format

items.name: meta
items.description: Additional metadata related to the moderation report, provided as key-value pairs

body.name: error
body.description: An error object containing specific details about any issues encountered during the report creation process.

items.description: A code representing the status or error related to the moderation report

items.name: message
items.description: A descriptive message providing context about the status or error

items.name: details
items.description: Detailed information or description related to the report status or error

items.name: requestId
items.description: Server-generated unique identifier for the request, useful for support and troubleshooting

body.name: error
body.description: An error object containing specific details about any issues encountered during the report creation process.

items.name: code

items.name: message
items.description: A human-readable message summarizing the status or result of the moderation report request.

items.name: details
items.description: Additional information or context related to the moderation report response, typically providing insights into results or errors.

items.name: requestId
items.description: A unique identifier generated by the server for tracking and support purposes related to this specific request.
